column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Fantastic food and incredible service! Started with the bone marrow. Salty
column2: fatty and perfect with their sourdough toast and onion jam. The steak was great
column5: Brussels sprouts) were some of the best we've had. We couldn't decide between the mashed potatoes and Mac and cheese
column6: went with the Mac but our server surprised us with both! Almost didn't have room for dessert but glad we tried the chocolate cream pie. Cocktails were delicious and our server Barbara made the entire night special
